participant_1.background:
I drive an old car to get to gigs, but I love my cats.
I like to keep my social media use to a minimum, but I love honey bees!
I like people who are understanding of my diet and phobia.
i have 4 pets.
i like to train dogs.

i am a social butterfly.
My pets are a source of endless inspiration for my writing.
i live in a rural area.
I am 130 pounds, and I want to rollerblade with my siblings.

content.text: Hey there! Hows your day going?
Hey! Its going pretty well! Hows yours?
Pretty good! I'm just hanging out with my cats.
Oh nice! I have two cats myself. What are your cats names?
Their names are Mittens and Smokey. What are your cats names?
One of my cats is named Mittens too! His name is Mittens because he likes to play with mittens. My other cat's name is Shadow.
Shadow is an awesome name! I love that. I got my cats from a shelter and they were both named Mittens when I got them.
Oh wow! That's so cool! I got my cats from a friend who had to get rid of them.
Aw, thats sad. But I'm glad you were able to give them a good home.
Me too! They're really good cats and I'm glad I have them.
So, what are your interests?
I love to write, read, and play video games. I'm also a big fan of animals.
Oh cool! I love to write too! I also like to play video games and read. I'm not really into animals, but I don't mind them.
That's so cool! What kind of games do you like to play?
I mainly play single player games, but I also play some multiplayer games with my friends.
Oh nice! I love playing single player games too. I'm not really into multiplayer games, but I'll play them with my friends sometimes.
So, what do you do for a living?
I'm a writer. I write books and articles for magazines. I also do some freelance work.
Oh wow! That's so cool! I've always wanted to be a writer.
It's a lot of work, but it's also a lot of fun.
I'm sure it is. I'm glad you're enjoying your job.
